key_concepts.title: Multimedia Retrieval System
components: User interface: text similarity, browsing, playing, visualization, query description
Query manager for segmentation and meta data creation
Integrated databases: VideoDB, AudioDB, ImageDB, TextDB
Meta data: automatic extraction, manual annotation, joined meta data

key_concepts.title: MMObjects
key_concepts.description: Multimedia data stored in a MongoDB (document-oriented database).
features: Flexible structure allowing objects of different sizes

key_concepts.title: Exercise: Relational MMDBS
requirements: Store information about landmarks (e.g., Victoria Falls, Golden Gate Bridge).
Categories for landmarks, each with one super category (e.g., man-made, nature).
Pictures and videos assigned to each landmark.
Users can add keywords and free text for landmarks.

points: Combinations of different media types in one database are possible.
Deep Learning is the foundation for content-based retrieval.
Developers of MMDBS need knowledge in data modeling, database systems, implementation, user interfaces, and multimedia meta data (creation, representation, meaning, comparison).
